currentIssues.description: Empty state messages lack proper semantic structure and ARIA labels
currentIssues.location: Technology Status Distribution and Research Task Status Distribution sections

currentIssues.description: All metric cards have equal visual weight despite showing zero values
currentIssues.location: Total Repositories, Technologies, Research Tasks, Knowledge Base cards

currentIssues.description: Gray text in empty states appears to have insufficient contrast ratio
currentIssues.location: 'No data available' and 'Start adding items' text

currentIssues.description: Quick action buttons lack disabled states when no data exists
currentIssues.location: Add Technology, Create Task, Upload Document buttons

currentIssues.description: Inconsistent vertical spacing between dashboard sections
currentIssues.location: Between Quick Actions and chart sections

recommendations.title: Increase empty state text contrast
recommendations.description: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA contrast requirements by darkening gray values
recommendations.code:
className='text-gray-700' // Instead of text-gray-500
className='text-gray-600' // Instead of text-gray-400

recommendations.title: De-emphasize zero-value metric cards
recommendations.description: Apply muted styling to metric cards with zero values to guide users to quick actions
recommendations.code: className={`${count === 0 ? 'opacity-60 bg-gray-50' : 'bg-white'} rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200 p-6 transition-opacity`}

recommendations.title: Add semantic structure to empty states
recommendations.description: Wrap empty state messages in proper semantic HTML with ARIA labels for screen readers
recommendations.code:
No data available

Start adding items to see the distribution

recommendations.title: Add contextual button states
recommendations.description: Show primary action emphasis on quick action buttons when dashboard is empty
recommendations.code: className={`${isEmpty ? 'ring-2 ring-purple-500 ring-offset-2 animate-pulse' : ''} px-4 py-2 rounded-lg flex items-center gap-2 transition-all`}

recommendations.title: Implement skip navigation
recommendations.description: Add skip links for keyboard users to quickly navigate between dashboard sections
recommendations.code: Skip to quick actions
